enum.name: Error
enum.description: An enumeration representing various error codes.

value.name: FileNotFound
value.description: The specified file was not found.

value.name: FileAlreadyInUse
value.description: The file is already in use.

value.name: Max
value.description: Maximum value for the Error enum.

function.description: Retrieves a string representation of the given error code.
function.param: The error code to get the string representation for.
function.returns: The error message as a string.

function.description: Finds the error code corresponding to the given error message.
function.param: The error message to find the corresponding error code for.
function.returns: The Error enum value corresponding to the provided error message, or Error::Unknown if not found.
